active_skill.en_text: Activate a random skill from the list: 1) Charge all allies' skills by 1 turn; Replace all orbs, 2) Change the far right column to Fire orbs; Charge all allies' skills by 1 turn, 3) For 1 turn, increase combo count by 1; Change Light, Heal, Jammer, Poison, and Mortal Poison orbs to Fire orbs, and 4) Change all orbs to Fire, Wood, and Heal orbs; Charge all allies' skills by 1 turn
